ygData.subject: Re: News Flash On SoW
ygData.msgSnippet: What happened to me last night - a druid casts it on me - I told her not to do that - and said she did it to annoy me (grrr).  I had Selo s running at the
ygData.messageBody:
What happened to me last night - a druid casts it on me - I told her not
to do that - and said she did it to annoy me (grrr). I had Selo's running
at the time. When I switched off Selo's I found that I ran at normal (i.e.
non-Sow non-Selo) speed until I zoned. Evidently it works like Selo's used
to when someone had SOW on them before the patch...

I almost quit grouping with the Druid at that point - but she turned out
to be okay - and didn't do it again. In retrospect - I think she DIDN'T
know about it - but made a poor attempt at humor after she cast it.

It seems that the majority of people don't know about the change. Both
SOW casters routinely casting it on everyone who can't ask; and everyone
else freaking when you play Selo's when they have it cast on them.
Similarly - a great number of people still ask me to play the Jig to speed
their mana regeneration...

Slyde

----- Original Message -----
From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 1999 9:42 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] News Flash On SoW


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Last knight - shaperson fiend says hi - I say hi - I go to run off and
wtf?
> he sow'd me <grrr>
>
> right click -- <grrrr>
>
> find druid with cancel magic <smiles>
>
> u can NOT right click it off u if u r not the caster.
>
> Sylly
>
